claimRewards(bytes32,bool).details: Validators can claim rewards or add them to their stake

params._addToStake: <bool> - Send the rewards back to the validator's stake
params._validatorId: <bytes32> - ID of the validator claiming rewards

params._governor: <address> - Address of the multisig contract as Governor of this contract

mintRewardTokens(address,uint256).details: Governance contract owns this contract and can mint tokens based on reward calculationsThe RewardManger contract must be added as a treasurer in the GraphToken contract req Calculate rewards based on local variables and call the mint function in GraphToken

params._account: <address> - The account that will receive the created tokens.
params._value: <uint256> - The amount that will be created.

transferGovernance(address).details: The current `governor` can assign a new `governor`

updateCuratorRewardRate(uint256).details: Governance contract owns this contract and can update curatorRewardRate

updateTargetParticipationRate(uint256).details: Governance contract owns this contract and can update targetParticipationRate

updateYearlyInflationRate(uint256).details: Governance contract owns this contract and can update targetParticipationRate

params._newYearlyInflationRate: <uint256> - New yearly inflation rate in parts per million. (999999 = 99.9999%)
